name: nannotes-fullstack
description: NANNOTES Educational Productivity Platform - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev-simple" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-frontend && npm run build

author: saikumarreddyappidi
